1111101000110010 1100111001001001 1 -> sum: 1100100001111100, cout: 1

0101000001001110 0000101101000110 0 -> sum: 0101101110010100, cout: 0
1001100110001110 0010111001011110 0 -> sum: 1100011111101100, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
